topic.name: flowapi_topic
topic.description: The topic set for this flow, which is used to send and recive messages to and from the flow.
topic.label: Topic

title.name: flowapi_title
title.description: The title to use for this flow. Update this component to change the title of the flow in Flow Designer.
title.label: Title

group.name: flowapi_group
group.description: This is the group that the flow belongs to, its used to group relevant flows.
group.label: Group

template.name: flowapi_template
template.description: This is the template that the flow is based on, its used to create new flows from a template.
template.label: Template

designtemplate.name: flowapi_designtemplate
designtemplate.description: This is the design template that the flow is based on, its used to update the design of the flow.
designtemplate.label: Design Template

sampledata.name: flowapi_sampledata
sampledata.description: This is the sample data that is added to the flow to help to get started.
sampledata.label: Sample Data

httproute.name: flowapi_httproute
httproute.description: This is the HTTP route for REST API for this flow, where applicable, not used in all flow enabled components.
httproute.label: HTTP Route

iscontainer.name: flowapi_iscontainer
iscontainer.description: This is a flag to indicate if the flow is a container flow, where applicable, not used in all flow enabled components.
iscontainer.label: Is Container

flowstreamid.name: flowapi_flowstreamid
flowstreamid.description: This is the flow stream ID for this flow, this is used to identify the flow in the flow stream.
flowstreamid.label: Flow ID

createdon.name: flowapi_createdon
createdon.description: This is the date and time that the flow was created.
createdon.label: Created On

updatedon.name: flowapi_updatedon
updatedon.description: This is the date and time that the flow was last updated.
updatedon.label: Updated On

editflow1.name: flowapi_editurl
editflow1.description: This is the URL to edit the flow in Flow Designer.
editflow1.label: Flow Designer
editflow1.title: Edit this flow in Flow Designer
